rows.label: tlk41700172_03_msg0001
rows.name:
When the Invidian and Superbian armies came,
we showed them our protest.

rows.label: tlk41700172_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm sure there are those who don't like
the fact that Blade management is
concentrated in Acedia.

rows.label: tlk41700172_03_msg0003
rows.name:
You're a Driver, so you must think so too, right?
Being managed by an unrelated country is
nothing but a hassle.
